pr_title: Support disabling pgpool load balancing in importer

timeline.message:
add hibernate interceptor to prepend comments to generated SQL statements to disable pgpool load balancing

Signed-off-by: Xin Li <xin.li@swirlds.com>

timeline.bodyText: Would prefer a positively phrased property and in the infinitive form e.g. loadBalance=true.
timeline.author: steven-sheehy

replies.bodyText: sure. the only reason for a negative property name is I wanted to keep the property's value and postgresql.enabled the same.
replies.author: xin-hedera

timeline.bodyText: Add a comment that provides a link to the docs that show why this hack works.
timeline.author: steven-sheehy

timeline.bodyText: Can remove the last statement as it's unnecessary to say how it is implemented. Would add a blurb about what load balancing means in this context (e.g. it sends all reads to the primary instead of balancing them across the primary and replicas).
timeline.author: steven-sheehy

timeline.bodyText: This should be populated in charts/hedera-mirror-importer/values.yaml instead of here. The others are only here since they are needed by postgresql-ha chart.
